body:
Once upon a time, Joshua wrote :

> Does anyone know how often the apt.freshrpms.net repository is 
> updated? Is it rsync'ed? It's quite a bit out of date right now. For a
> BIND update released mid-July, for example, it has:

This is very strange... the Red Hat mirror update is run at least 3 or 4
times a week, I'll look into it right now.

Thanks for reporting this!

Matthias
